name: FC-200
details:
MIDI Foot ControllerThe FC-200 is a rugged MIDI foot controller that's built to withstand the rigors of live performance. It offers extensive control capabilities, an onboard expression pedal, and numeric LED for instant confirmation of patch numbers.

MIDI foot controller with 128 patch selections, more using bank select
Provides realtime control of volume and MIDI parameters
Combines program changes and bank selections for fast operation
Heavy-duty, roadworthy metal construction

Can be used with the Roland GP-100
Connectors:
MIDI (In, Out)
MODE Change
Control/Expression Pedal Jacks (1 to 6)
DC In
